titles.title: No More Tolls for Roads Act of 2015
To terminate certain toll authorities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
4/21/2015--Introduced. No More Tolls for Roads Act of 2015
Federal authorities are terminated on and after January 1, 2016, for the establishment of a toll facility or the charging of a toll with respect to a federal-aid highway.
